mapper.sql: id, student_id, lesson_id, course_id, progress, completed, watch_time, view_count, last_position, status, notes, rating, started_at, completed_at, created_at, updated_at, last_studied_at
mapper.update: UPDATE lesson_progress SET progress = #{progress}, completed = #{completed}, watch_time = #{studyDuration}, view_count = #{viewCount}, last_position = #{lastPosition}, status = #{status}, notes = #{notes}, rating = #{rating}, started_at = #{startedAt}, completed_at = #{completedAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, last_studied_at = #{lastStudiedAt}, course_id = #{courseId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE lesson_progress SET status = 'deleted', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM lesson_progress WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY lesson_id

SELECT lp.lesson_id as lessonId, lp.course_id as courseId, lp.progress as progress, lp.last_studied_at as lastStudiedAt, l.title as lessonTitle FROM lesson_progress lp LEFT JOIN lessons l ON lp.lesson_id = l.id WHERE lp.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY lp.last_studied_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT COALESCE( SUM(lp.progress * COALESCE(l.weight, 1.00)) / NULLIF(SUM(COALESCE(l.weight, 1.00)), 0) , 0) FROM lesson_progress lp JOIN lessons l ON lp.lesson_id = l.id WHERE lp.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT COALESCE( SUM(lp.progress * COALESCE(l.weight, 1.00)) / NULLIF(SUM(COALESCE(l.weight, 1.00)), 0) , 0) FROM lesson_progress lp JOIN lessons l ON lp.lesson_id = l.id WHERE lp.student_id = #{studentId} AND l.course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT COUNT(*) as totalLessons, SUM(IF(completed = 1, 1, 0)) as completedLessons, COALESCE(AVG(progress), 0) as averageProgress, COALESCE(SUM(watch_time), 0) as totalStudyTime FROM lesson_progress WHERE student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT DATE(last_studied_at) as date, SUM(watch_time) as studyTime, COUNT(DISTINCT lesson_id) as completedLessons FROM lesson_progress WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND last_studied_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY DATE(last_studied_at) ORDER BY date
mapper.update: UPDATE lesson_progress SET progress = 0, completed = 0, completed_at = NULL, watch_time = 0, last_position = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
UPDATE lesson_progress SET progress = #{progress}, last_position = #{lastPosition}, last_studied_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND lesson_id = #{lessonId}
UPDATE lesson_progress SET completed = 1, progress = 100, completed_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND lesson_id = #{lessonId}
UPDATE lesson_progress SET rating = #{rating}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND lesson_id = #{lessonId}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(watch_time), 0) FROM lesson_progress WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND updated_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(lp.rating), 0.0) FROM lesson_progress lp JOIN lessons l ON lp.lesson_id = l.id JOIN courses c ON l.course_id = c.id WHERE c.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND lp.rating IS NOT NULL

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(main.completion_rate), 0.0) FROM ( SELECT AVG(lp.progress) as completion_rate FROM lesson_progress lp JOIN lessons l ON lp.lesson_id = l.id JOIN courses c ON l.course_id = c.id WHERE c.teacher_id = #{teacherId} GROUP BY lp.student_id, l.course_id ) main
